title: Gangsters Insult ‘Goodfellas’ Character Henry Hill in Lufthansa Trial Recordings
text:
Published By: NYTimes NY Region - Today 
Mafia associates say the real-life Henry Hill played a minor role in the 1978 Kennedy Airport heist, and they disparaged him on recordings p...
